ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Tambourine
ygData.msgSnippet: They probable DT for about 300 points max. I did take 2 DT s as a 35 bard and since we have such wimpy hit points, couldn t have been more than that. I do
ygData.messageBody:
They probable DT for about 300 points max. I did take 2 DT's as a 35 bard
and since we have such wimpy hit points, couldn't have been more than that.

I do highly recommend you get a SoW to pull one out of the canyon, even
before our drums were broken.

---Windleaf

At 03:24 PM 1/12/01 -0700, you wrote:
>Ummm, I think both of those would likely HT me for far more that a bub or 2
>at 35th??? Wouldn't they? Heck I don't know, if that's all HT does at that
>level it is hardly fearsome in an outdoor situation.
>
> Kit
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
>Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 3:19 PM
>To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Tambourine
>
>
>probably for about a bub or 2 of health... Just think of how the king HT's
>in sol b or lord in guk. Just a hunch
>
>-Minkin
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
>Sent: January 12, 2001 5:12 PM
>To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Tambourine
>
>
>How much does he Harmtouch for? That's the primary concern that has kept me
>from going to get this one. I have little experience with shadowknights
>past about 15th level so I have no idea how much their HT does.
>
> Kit
